duration.reason: Longer samples provide more stable metrics

audio_clarity.reason: Many unclear words indicate audio/speech quality issues

boundary_proximity.reason: Scores on .0/.5 boundaries are less stable

confidence.recommendation: Very low confidence. Score unreliable. Retest required with better audio conditions.

descriptors.fluency_coherence: Able to keep going readily with long turns without noticeable effort. Some hesitation and repetition.
descriptors.pronunciation: Uses wide range of phonological features. Can sustain appropriate rhythm.
descriptors.lexical_resource: Wide resource, readily used. Skilful use of less common items despite occasional inaccuracies.
descriptors.grammatical_range_accuracy: Range of structures flexibly used. Error-free sentences frequent.

feedback.fluency_coherence: Adequate fluency. Able to produce extended speech but with noticeable pauses.
feedback.pronunciation: Adequate pronunciation. Generally understood but occasional clarity issues.
feedback.overall_recommendation: Adequate performance. Focus on fluency and reducing hesitations would help.
